actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Elmer L. Bridson.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Army to provide a named individual with a set of silver wings as replacement for such original silver wings which were destroyed in an accident involving a military vehicle. Directs the Secretary to receive and consider the claim of such individual relating to the destruction of any other personal property as a result of such accident.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Elmer L. Bridson.
